spec_data.Name: rubygem-prawn-svg
spec_data.Description:
This gem allows you to render SVG directly into a PDF using the 'prawn' gem.
Since PDF is vector-based, you'll get nice scaled graphics if you use SVG
instead of an image.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:15:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: SVG renderer for Prawn PDF library
